text: Asplenium bifrons is a species of fern in the family Aspleniaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. It is known only from one population in Pichincha Province. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss for hydroelectric power. ==References== bifrons Category:Ferns of Ecuador Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Ferns of the Americas Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Asplenium bifrons
